### Payment or Benefits to Promoters or Promoter Group

Except in the ordinary course of business and as stated in the section entitled “Other Financial Information - Related Party Transactions” on page 349, there have been no payment or benefits by our Company to our Promoters or any of the members of the Promoter Group during the two years preceding the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, nor is there any intention to pay or give any benefit to our Promoter or Promoter Group as on the date of this Red Herring Prospectus.
### Disassociation by our Promoters in the last three years
Except as disclosed below our Promoters have not disassociated with any company or firm in the last three years as on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus:
